org.streaminer.stream.avg

Class VariableEWMA

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.streaminer.stream.avg.SimpleEWMA
      • org.streaminer.stream.avg.VariableEWMA
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAverage

    public class VariableEWMA
extends SimpleEWMA
    VariableEWMA represents the exponentially weighted moving average of a series of numbers. Unlike SimpleEWMA, it supports a custom age, and thus uses more memory. Original code: https://github.com/VividCortex/ewma
    Author:
    Maycon Viana Bordin

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int count
      The number of samples added to this instance.
      protected double decay
      The multiplier factor by which the previous samples decay.

    • Constructor Detail

      • VariableEWMA

        public VariableEWMA(double age)
        Parameters:
        age - The age is related to the decay factor alpha by the formula given for the DECAY constant. It signifies the average age of the samples as time goes to infinity.
